Class CourseSelectionDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.mysql.helper.CourseSelectionDBHelper

  • public class CourseSelectionDBHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    CourseSelectionDBHelper provide higher level API to interact with MySQL

      • addCourse

        public boolean addCourse(java.lang.String courseNumber,
                         java.lang.String courseTitle,
                         int instructorNumber,
                         int courseSize,
                         int courseWeekday,
                         java.lang.String courseClasstime)
        Add a Course into MySql
        Parameters:
        courseNumber - Course's number(Fixed to 5 char)
        courseTitle - Course's title
        instructorNumber - Instructor's number
        courseSize - Course's size (10~ 255)
        courseWeekday - Course's week day (1 ~ 5)
        courseClasstime - Course's class time (1~8), can be multiple(2,3,4,)
        Returns:
        True: Success, False: Failed

      • validSelectionData

        public boolean validSelectionData(int studentNumber,
                                  java.lang.String courseNumber)
        Using locking reads to ... 1. Check duplicate selection 2. Verify course selection times do not conflict 3. Deduct course remain https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/innodb-locking-reads.html https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/jdbc/basics/transactions.html
        Parameters:
        courseNumber - Course's number
        studentNumber - Student's number
        Returns:
        True: Valid, False: Invalid

      • validDeleteByNumberSelectionData

        public boolean validDeleteByNumberSelectionData(int selectionNumber)
        Using locking reads to ... 1. Get Student and Course's number 2. Check selection exist 3. Add course remain https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/innodb-locking-reads.html https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/jdbc/basics/transactions.html
        Parameters:
        selectionNumber - Selection's number
        Returns:
        True: Valid, False: Invalid
